items.title: Artha Chitra – Online Poster Making Competition on Financial Literacy
items.excerpt: Join the online poster competition on financial literacy.
items.contentHtml:
Artha Chitra

Create a poster to spread financial awareness. Top entries will be showcased online.

  • Theme: Financial Literacy
  • Eligibility: 14+ years
  • Deadline: 5 Oct 2025
PrizeReward
1st₹15,000 + Certificate
2nd₹10,000 + Certificate
3rd₹5,000 + Certificate

items.title: Logo Making Contest for the World’s Oldest Living City - Kashi
items.excerpt: Design a logo that reflects Kashi's heritage.
items.contentHtml:
Kashi Logo Contest

Submit your creative logo. Shortlisted designs will go for public voting.

items.title: Reel Making Contest for Engaging Youth in Emerging STI for Viksit Bharat
items.excerpt: Make a short reel on science, tech & innovation themes.
items.contentHtml:
STI Reels

Record a 30–60s reel highlighting an STI theme that excites you.
